translation.Name: Rio Note - Betrayal #1
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_0: I see the mistakes we've done. None of them, except me, sees the true monster here, it isn't the ZPD, or the zombies either. The TRUE monsters here are the ones in this group, we are the true monsters, none of them see it. This group became a mess from the point in which the old leader threw 2 hordes beacons in 2 innocent cities. To fix it, I must end what made the problem even worse, I must end the Zombie Exterminators once and for all.
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_1: If you are reading this, I hope you understand. Unfortunately the only way I see that I can end this problem is by using the same thing that made this problem even worse, a horde beacon. The camp will fall, nobody here is innocent, I can see it. They simply don't care anymore about life, they don't care about who they kill, a zombie, or a human.
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_2: Do not destroy my horde beacon and this suffering will end, once and for all.
